# Discord Chat Analysis for ðŸ’»â”‚developers

## 1. Summary:
The discussion primarily focused on technical issues related to world development and script execution. A key problem emerged when Gh0stt's world became inaccessible due to crashing scripts. Ash suggested using a URL parameter "?safemode=1" to disable script execution, but this wasn't available in the Numinia version Gh0stt was using. Ash then provided a JavaScript code snippet to force all apps to have no script, though this solution also blocked the app list. The conversation revealed that Numinia was running an older version without the safemode feature. Other technical topics included storing assets on IPFS, implementing Vector3 configuration options in apps, and chess game development. Gh0stt shared a pre-release chess game (https://pre.chess.numen.games) that had some connection issues. The chat concluded with a mention of a new AI model.

## 2. FAQ:
Q: Is there a way to run your world in safe mode? (asked by Gh0stt) A: Add ?safemode=1 to the URL (answered by ash)
Q: What other flags exist? (asked by .hyp shaman) A: Unanswered
Q: How to set a vector3 in the config options? (asked by Gh0stt) A: You need to parse it yourself and use a string or number type (answered by Shiffty)

## 3. Help Interactions:
Helper: ash | Helpee: Gh0stt | Context: World became inaccessible due to crashing scripts | Resolution: Provided JavaScript code to disable scripts and mentioned DevStarlight would help
Helper: Shiffty | Helpee: Gh0stt | Context: Setting vector3 in config options | Resolution: Suggested parsing it manually using string or number type with documentation link
Helper: ash | Helpee: Gh0stt | Context: Vector3 field implementation | Resolution: Explained that vec3 field type exists but isn't exposed to config yet, suggested code locations to modify

## 4. Action Items:
Type: Technical | Description: Implement safemode feature in all versions to prevent world loss due to script crashes | Mentioned By: Gh0stt
Type: Technical | Description: Update Numinia to include recent changes from dev branch | Mentioned By: DevStarlight | Numinia
Type: Feature | Description: Expose Vector3 field type to configuration options | Mentioned By: ash
Type: Technical | Description: Fix connection issues in chess game (https://pre.chess.numen.games) | Mentioned By: Valiant

The chat segment is brief and primarily focuses on the possibility of adding API key support to hosted worlds in HyperWorld. A user inquires about non-technical options for building "vibe coded universes" in HyperWorld. Another user asks about API key support for hosted worlds, which is confirmed to be in development by HypPrivakos. Gert-Jan Akerboom mentions getting a HyperWorld host and shares their URL.

The chat segment is extremely brief, containing only a single message from user PabloFM | Numinia sharing an article link from rwx.mirror.xyz, followed by a message from Rick that contains no text. There are no technical discussions, problem-solving activities, or implementations to summarize in this limited exchange.
